column3: Separate PR because the commits for #21334 can be merged to 0.20 without modification this way.  The fuzz test commit has to be cherry-picked and edited due to lack of #20560 in 0.21.\n\nIncluding these commits should make it easier to backport either of the speedy trial PRs.
If anyone is running into compile failures in FuzzedDataProvider, a fix is being backported in #20901
